transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Sandesh ji good morning Pallavi baat kar rahi hu India Mart Noida head office se.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Ji kaise hain sir?
Customer: Badhiya madam.
Executive: Ji sir Manas se bhi aapka discussion hua tha abhi kuch din pehle bhi kuch shayad issues aaye the wo bhi hum logo ne resolve karwa diya tha kuch cancel ka issue tha ji ji okay sir ye abhi aapka recent ek concern aaya hua hai service pause karne ke liye to sir pause ki facility hum log ke paas nahi hai sir services continue mere ek form thi pehle Amrit Industry aap dekh sakte hain aapke usme usme bhi maine karwaya tha monthly mode pe unka monthly mode pe chal raha hoga to unhone for a time being utna ECS nahi deduct karwaya hoga ye ho sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi madam yearly chal raha tha uska bhi payment mode to mere hath me hi tha na wo to sirf meri meri form thi wo to suniye suniye sir pure saal ka aapne payment kiya hai pause fir wahi hai ki ya to aap utne us utne timing me aap jo hai services use na kare yahi hota hai sir aur koi option nahi hota hai isme aap kaise matlab pause kaise keh rahe hain kaise kar rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi grahak ke paas ab lead aana mere liye ek mahine ke liye band ho jana ek mahine baad chalu kar dena aap wo jo ek mahina lead aana wo.
Executive: Sir dekhiye lead buyer ke side se aati hai hum use pause nahi kar sakte hain aap ek kaam ye kariye for a time being jab tak aap matlab services nahi dekh rahe hain tab tak aap use mat consume kariye jo bhi buyer call aa rahi hai wo filhal answer karte rahiye.
Customer: To fir wo consume nahi kar raha hu to wo to matlab.
Executive: Wo to ultimately lapse ho hi jayengi na jo bhi aapki weekly basis pe jo buyleads aa rahi hain wo to ultimately lapse ho hi rahi hain aap agar unko consume karte hain consumption karte hain.
Customer: Usko pause karne ka koi facility nahi hai.
Executive: Sir agar hota na main aapko wo option zarur deti sir nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Sandesh ji agar hota main aapko bata deti.
Customer: Bas yahi hai ki tab tak aap mat dekhiye service jab tak aap nahi time de pa rahe hain.
Executive: Itna nahi hota na madam nuksan to hoga na apna wo aisa thodi ki nuksan nahi hoga wo nahi dekh raha hu to nuksan kiska ho raha hai mera ho raha hai aap.
Executive: Koi person aap rakh le aisa jo dekh sake for a time being services.
Customer: Abhi nahi ready hai abhi to main person bhi rakh ke kya karunga ab Diwali candle ka season band ho gaya ab naya PVC pipe ka production abhi mera start nahi hua hai to fir main karunga kya usko ye main us time bhi bola tha ki aap Diwali season ke baad karenge to bole ki nahi sir wo kar lenge aap iska fees tha wo.
Executive: Abhi to sir abhi abhi to PVC pipe wagera ke aapne product isme add kar rakhe hain hai na candle.
Customer: Haan main kar rakhe hain madam Diwali ke time sare product use ho jate hain fir baad me sab sab wo ho jata hai ye ab theek hai ab aage se apan is cheez ko.
Executive: Ek kaam aap ye kariye na suniye main aapko isme ek suggestion de sakti hu aap filhal aapke product kab tak ready honge sir pure.
Customer: Product mera ek mahine ke andar mera PVC pipe ka production start ho jayega meri machine aane wali hai machine aa jayegi mera start ho jayega production to aap ek mahina aur ek mahina to maine jyada bol diya main aapko balki usse pehle bol dunga ki madam chalu kar do mera production.
Executive: To sir aisa kar lijiye na aapko ek main isme best option deti hu aap tab tak ki buyer se baat karte rahiye sir aapke paas lead to rahegi na aisa to nahi hai buyer ki requirement keval ek bar ki rahegi.
Customer: Time ka issue hai aap wo to fir main option me to agar aap nahi karenge to fir ye option me to bahut sare hain aise to main kar sakta hu magar ye hai na ki aapke liye mere liye easy option matlab mere liye comfort wala option yahi hai wo to ek formality me apne aap ko samjhana hai ki ha yaar main lead use kar raha hu wo wala format hai.
Executive: Nahi sir main pause to dekhiye nahi.
Customer: Kyunki abhi.
Executive: Chalo theek hai madam chodiye fir ab main.
Executive: Dekhiye main sir concern aapka band kar rahi hu jo bhi aapka mere se discussion hua hai feedback share kar dijiyega theek hai dekhiye sir jo cheez nahi hai wo main aapko miss commitment to nahi dungi ki sir ho jayega.
Customer: Theek hai aapke sath bataye theek hai okay thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to pause the services.

- Customer is facing loss due to service usage.



Resolution:

- Executive informed that pausing service is unavailable.

- Suggested to keep talking to buyers.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pause, buyleads, services, production
